features: 🔋Nightstands Set Of 2 With Charging Station🔋： This end tables bedroom set of 2 includes built-in 2 AC outlets（1500w 12a）and 3 USB ports （1 X USB-C, 2 X USB-A ）. Say goodbye to charging anxiety as you effortlessly access fast charging interfaces, while a separate wire connects your light without occupying any charging station ports. Energy is always at your fingertips!

🌈Illuminate RGB LED Light Strip🌈： Our night stand with charger station comes with a mesmerizing multicolored RGB LED light strip. Choose from 20 vibrant colors, adjust speed levels with 10 different options, and select from 5 brightness modes using the sleek 17-key IR remote. Create a warm and enchanting atmosphere with our bedside tables/side tables living room.

⭐Storage Solutions Galore⭐： Experience versatile storage options with our dresser and nightstand sets. It has 1 drawer for hidden storage, easy to slide in and out, and 1 tier wood shelf and 1 tier metal shelf for open storage， convenient to place your personal items in the drawer or putting your phone, books, eyeglasses, watch, snacks and table lamps according to your different storage requirements.

🏡Perfect for Any Space🏡: Our smart bedside table are true furniture masterpieces with their stylish and modern design. Whether it's a college dorm, office, closet, entryway, or hallway or as record player stand, or printer stand, these night stand fit seamlessly. With their lightweight construction, you can easily move them to any desired location, adding functionality and style wherever you go.

💪Durability Meets Elegance💪: Crafted from sturdy thickened carbon metal and E0 grade particle board, our nightstands ensure long-lasting performance. The 4 adjustable feet provide stability and the ease of cleaning is a breeze—just wipe gently with a damp cloth to bid farewell to any stains!

🛠️Effortless Assembly🛠️: Measuring 15.4" x 11.8" x 23.2", our LED nightstand is a breeze to assemble. Simply follow the provided assembly instructions and use the tools we've included for a hassle-free setup. Should you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to us. We guarantee a response within 12 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really well built, but very small
reviews.reviewText: I have only positive things to say about these. Well built, well packaged, instructions clear, parts labelled perfectly, even a bag of spare hardware. Only thing to be aware of is size. The size in the description is absolutely accurate, just take note of it and measure out what that really looks like in your room. Once you’ve got a lamp on these, you might get a glass of water and a phone on the top shelf, but that’s about it. Luckily you’ve got two other levels to put things on and a drawer. In my case, it’s fine because more space just means more clutter for me lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but a little pricey
reviews.reviewText: These are nice little tables with great additional features, but about $50 a piece for these seems a little too high for the size and materials used. The drawer with the handle is fabric like material.I do like the lights and built in outlets and think they're a great option for those who may not be able to routinely lean over to reach a standard wall outlet. To me the red light is easiest on the eyes in low light settings. The weight is also low, making these easy to pick up and move.Assembly was simple and I built both at the same time. Both arrived in the same box and it's easier to assemble if you sort/group the pieces in order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I got this during the prime sale and it's pretty sturdy. Definitely worth the money for two nightstands. Easy to set up and it's not heavy to move. The only gripe is that the drawer is just a tad bit flimsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super easy instructions, I was pleasantly suprised. Great look. Cool product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They're nice but...
reviews.reviewText: I've had issues with the charging plugs, some just flat out don't work. I still have to charge my phone from the wall plug. It does work great for my lamp.Also, do not turn one on if the other is not plugged in and then plug the other one in. They should both be plugged in before turning the lights on or it's a pain to sync them. Both remotes work on both lights so you can't just turn one on and off.Easy to assemble if you have half a brain and all the pieces are there 😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small And Perfect!
reviews.reviewText: These are so compact and cute. Perfect size. Not too big not to small. Love the different usb ports it have ! LED’s are a plus when trying to see in the middle of the night lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two to serve as nightstands and provide aesthetics to the room with the LED lights. They were easy to put together the instructions were very clear for anyone wondering yes the drawer is like a fabric product but I have three more dressers with the same type of drawers so this works for me.The drawer is a nice size and then you have the top and bottom to place things on. The convenience of the outlets is great also. The ONLY problem I have is that the lights tend to turn on by themselves and sometimes it’s just one side so if I hit the power button the one that’s on goes off but then the other one turns on which forces me to unplug the one that is off and then turn off the other one.Overall though they are nice sturdy little nightstands and are lightweight for easy moving

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not too large but plenty of storage. Two outlets, two USB ports AND a USB-C port. The lights are adjustable in color, brightness, and can even blink at several speeds. Great buy.
